text: Va [ej pajomʙar, musulmonon] az tu dar ʙorai zanon nazarxohī mekunand; Bigū: "Alloh taolo dar ʙorai onon fatvo medihad va dar on ci az kitoʙ [Qur'on] ʙar şumo xonda meşavad, [niz] omadaast, ki [hukmi Ū] dar ʙorai duxtaroni jatime, ki haqqi muqarraraşon [az mahrijai voris]-ro namepardozed va majl ʙa izdivoç ʙo onon nadored [va az rūji tama' dar amvolaşon ononro az izdivoç man' mekuned] va [hamcunin, dasturaş dar mavridi] kūdakoni notavon [in ast], ki: "Dar haqqi jatimon ʙa adlu insof ʙikūşed" va har on ci az nekiho, ki ançom medihed, Alloh taolo ʙa on ogoh ast
